title: Github
text: Github is where I store all my software repositories. This also includes the code for this website! Click the title to see my projects!

title: Article Writing
text: I write articles on Medium about various things I have learnt about recently. This helps consolidate my learning, and allows other people who read my articles to learn from them as well.

title: Volunteering
text: I volunteer for various teaching positions to teach students about computing concepts that are tougher to understand (such as data flow or database management) which develops my communication skills
